Dark Souls II - the second part of the hardcore RPG , action which develop in a dark fantasy world filled with scary monsters and a variety of puzzles. Compared with the last part seriously improved graphics and sound.
Bestiary Dark Souls II topped a lot of new enemies and bosses to kill which pick up the special tactics. To counter the new threats provides advanced system customization of weapons and armor hero.
Continuation of the famous role-playing action again force players to go through the most difficult test. Dark Souls II will offer a new hero , a new history and a new world. Only one thing consistently - to survive in a bleak universe Dark Souls is very difficult.
No cost Dark Souls II and without a business card series - network mode . Updated multiplayer mechanics displays indirect interaction of players to the next level , where the most persistent and strong spirit awaits a worthy reward .
